name: Santa Run (itch) (Avram)
description:
Santa Run

Santa Run is a small game which I developed over a couple of weekends for my son to play during the upcoming holidays. I was using sounds from freesound.org and sprites from the GDevelop asset store.

In essence, it is an endless randomly generated platforming runner.  Platforms' horizontal position is completely random so it can and sometimes will create gaps impossible to jump. Don't sweat it, just try again!

Controls:

  • W or UP ARROW - jump
  • SPACE or RIGHT ARROW - slide-kick

A couple of notes:

  • You can jump again mid-air (while falling) to traverse greater spans between the platforms. Use it wisely!
  • If you don't kick a Snowman, it will trip you over and damage you.
  • Collect crystals to replenish health.
  • Touching water kills you instantly!

Enjoy!
